name: Mauerfall?
description:
Controls:

move left: -a / left arrow

move right: - d/ right arrow

dash: shift

Idea:

The german "mauerfall" (fall of the world) was one of tghe biggest events of the 20th century. Millions gatherd in a peaceful protests.

Meanwhile the DDR tried to hold together their"empire". You play one of those DDR soldiers. You try to defent the wall while peace signs, new bananas, D-Mark and love symbols fall onto it. You get payed, and in a cookie-clicker like wayyou upgrade stuff, hire helpers and place factories. It is a pretty symbolic game.

Hope you like it :)
